biography: Kenneth 'Babyface' Edmonds was born on April 10, 1959 in Indianapolis, Indiana, USA as Kenneth Brian Edmonds. He is known for his work on Bad Boys (1995), Ghostbusters II (1989) and Waiting to Exhale (1995). He has been married to Nicole Pantenburg since May 17, 2014. They have one child. He was previously married to Tracey E. Edmonds and Denise.
name: Kenneth Edmonds
